Package dev.simplix.cirrus.common.effect

Interface MenuAnimation<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractChangingItemAnimation, AbstractMenuAnimation, GradualColorChangeAnimation, RGBColorChangeAnimation, SimpleChangingItemAnimation
public interface MenuAnimation<T>

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<T>
    calculate()
    All calculated values for the effect
    int
    effectLength()
    Duration of the effect in the menu in ticks
    T
    input()
    Initial input of the effect
    T
    next()
    Next effect frame.

  • Method Details

    • effectLength

      int effectLength()
      Duration of the effect in the menu in ticks

    • input

      T input()
      Initial input of the effect

    • calculate

      List<T> calculate()
      All calculated values for the effect

    • next

      T next()
      Next effect frame. Usually calculated with an infinite iterable calculated with calculate() and created with Iterables.cycle(Object[])
